bug.author: kazunarikudo
bug.summary: Harvester GUI freezes if the attribute controller is opened while it's acquiring images.
bug.description:
Describe the bug Harvester GUI freezes if the attribute controller is opened while it's acquiring images. It seems to be relevant to the number of nodes that has been displayed/expanded. To Reproduce
Launch Harvester GUI. Connect a camera and start image acquisition. Open the attribute controller. You'll see Harvester GUI immediately freezes.
Expected behavior Harvester GUI must not be frozen. Additional context You may see the similar phenomenon when you try to expand the node tree clicking the Expand button in the toolbar in the attribute controller.

comments.comment: This issue seems to be depending on a specific XML file. I'll keep following up.
